name: The mirror is a reality
description: we can't see ourselves, sometimes a truth makes us unable to accept the situation, if we we don't look at ourselves deeper and in the mirror we can't see how bad we are, always think we are right, can't see wrong and side bad self, can't introspect look inside yourself, even though our own reflection is who you really are. This painting emphasizes the disclosure of psychological problems through symbolic signs. This artwork raises the issue of imagery and human values
